boardgame.name: Shipyard
Die Werft
boardgame.description: We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re in 19th century, sea transport is more and more important. Both corporations and naval forces require newer and newer ships. Try to put yourself in the role of their manufacturers. Hire employees, buy accessories, get favour of evaluating committees. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t forget to rent a canal and you can heave anchor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players take turns, beginning with a randomly selected player and continuing around the table clockwise. On their turn, they will choose one of the available actions from the Action Track. The action will get the player something they need to help build their ships. On the player's next turn, they will move that Action Card ahead of all the others and choose a different action._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If a player completes a ship on their turn (ships consists of little cards depicting bows, sterns, and (preferably several) middle pieces with several options to add equipment or crew), it is taken out for a shakedown cruise in a canal, during which they may score points for speed, crew, equipment, or safety._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As players take their turns, the line of Action Cards will advance around the Action Track. When the lead Action Card reaches the Starting Space again, the countdown marker moves down one space, and play continues._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when the countdown marker reaches the finish space. (It can also end early if the players run out of Ship Cards.) Bonus points are scored for Government Contracts, and the player with the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game lasts about 30 minutes per player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Description: We’re in the 19th century, where sea transport is crucial to commercial growth. Both corporations and naval forces require newer and newer ships. Try to put yourself in the role of their manufacturers. Hire employees, buy accesories, win the favor of evaluating committees. Score points for speed, crew, equipment or safety on your shakedown cruise. Be the best at ship-making and you will win the contracts and the game!
Contents: 1 game board in two halves 4 Shipyard boards 104 Ship cards 24 sails 24 smokestacks 24 propellers 24 cranes 24 cannons 24 captains 24 businessmen 24 soldiers 24 shipping canals 14 freight trains 48 employees 2 x 12 government contracts 12 playing figures 4 player ships 4 player counters 8 action cards 5 markers 40 coins in denominations 1 and 5 guilders 1 rulebook **************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Ich verkaufe hier das Brettspiel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Die Werft_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; von dem Hersteller CGE. Das Spiel ist für 2-4 Spieler und komplett in deutsch. Es ist ein Wirtschafts/Strategiespiel, bei dem der Spieler mit Hilfe seiner Werft möglichst große Schiffe aus dem 19./20. Jahrhundert konstrukiert um die meisten Siegpunkte zu ergattern. Dazu stehen diverse Bauteile etc. zur Verfügung. Dazu gilt es, das fertige Schiff auch fahrtüchtig zu gestalten, so dass es durch verschieden Gewässer fahren kann, was ebenfalls Siegpunkte bringt. Die Spielkomponenten sind fast unbenutzt (nur 2x aus beruflichen Testzwecken gespielt) und in guten Zustand. Die Spielbox hat lagerbedingt leichte Gebrauchsspuren an den Ecken (siehe Foto).
